title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:climbing'
- Allows the entity the power to climb.

allow_holding.description: If true, the entity that has the power is able to hold onto blocks.

hold_condition.description: If specified and allow_holding is true, the entity that has the power will be able to 'hold onto the block' (not affected by gravity) if the entity is sneaking and if this condition is fulfilled.
